title: Deep healing non-verbal hypnosis / Quantum Alchemy & Magnetism
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates strong and deep healing non-verbal hypnosis with Quantum alchemy elements and Magnetic passes. The subject is one of his students from his masterclass. She entered in a trance and her body reacted strongly. Dr. Paret uses Fascination - the power of the gaze and Animal Magnetism. Both of these ancient techniques, he teaches at his non-verbal hypnosis school, which is the most advanced in this field. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
